divs: sighting details my name is {pid}, i'am 18 years old male from scotch plains,new jersey and am currently on vaction in pasadena,california living at my uncle's house. ive always been a believer in ufos and ever since my first encounter ive been addicted to them.two days ago at apoximetly 6 pm i was on my uncle's balcony gazing west at the beautiful view of the mountains when i noticed something bright in the sky hovering for atleast an hour to an hour and a half. i knew it could not be a plane nor a helicopter because it did not contain the blinking red lights that transmite their locations to the faa. with that in mind i thought it had to be a star. so i went to go and grab my camera, i have a panasonic pv-gs400 which features 12x optical zoom with optical stabalizer. 700x digital zoom allows manual controls over these features: focus, exposure, shutter speed, aperture, white balance, mic sensitivity leica dicomar lens tape format: minidv still photo resolution: 2288 x 1728 pixels. ive always let my curriousity get the best of me because ive always known that there's always gonna be something special at the end of it. what i saw next was unbelieveable because never in my life have i ever seen anything like what i saw. at first it looked like a pyramid with 4 dots on it.i then realized that my camera had the option of 700x digital zoom instead of the standered 250x i imediatly switched it to 700x, and what i saw next amazed me beyond belief. it seemed like it had a sphere camera in the center of it or an eyeball,as i kept recording i noticed my battery was running out and died withing the next 10 mins of filming. as i previously mentioned im here on vaction and my brother had left the battery charger back home in jersey. this upseted me very much because i knew i was not going to be able to analyze the video that i just recorded. so the next day i did some research to see if anybody had witnessed what i had by going on google and youtube and typing in blue ufo\pyramids i went through a good amount of websites\video's untill one caught my eye. it was a blueish type pyramid exactly like mine, i clicked on the video and was amazed yet again. it was identical to my unidentified flying object except that it was filmed in russia and that his camera might have not been as good as mine. i will include my video links with this video including the one the russian guy filmed. by the way the ufo has been showing up here every night since i first filmed it around 5 or 6 pm. thank you for your time {pid} the video the russian guys video filmed
